sentences.sentence: If you ignore 1900, you can figure out if a given year is a leap year just by looking to see if the rightmost two bits are zero.
sentences.translation: 如果你忽略1900年，你就可以通过观察最右边的两位是否都为零来判断某一年是否为闰年。

sentences.sentence: In Figure 1 above, queue "B2R_2" had a WebSphere MQ latency of 0.4 second in the last interval (rightmost bar).
sentences.translation: 在上面的图1中，队列“B2R_2”在最近的周期内有一个0.4秒的WebSphere MQ延时(最右边的竖条)。

sentences.sentence: The inner voice is always rightmost of The Times because it knows us better than others and probably even ourselves.
sentences.translation: 心灵在大部分时候都是正确无误的，因为它比任何人都要了解我们，甚至超过我们自己。
